queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cscart_units ( unit_id INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, status VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', timestamp INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', upd_timestamp INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', user_id INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', slave_id varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', KEY (user_id), PRIMARY KEY (unit_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cscart_unit_descriptions ( unit_id INT(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', lang_code CHAR(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', unit VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', description TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (unit_id, lang_code) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
